summary: Project includes a website with a dynamic Menu page backed by an Admin Dashboard/CMS for managing menu items, categories, and products; current priority is restoring missing admin dashboard access and reconnecting it to the menu without changing the site UI.
architectural_notes: Do not regenerate or replace the website UI; this is a backend/admin visibility restoration only.
Admin Dashboard/CMS must be accessible via builder interface navigation (Admin / Dashboard / CMS).
Dynamic Menu page content must be sourced from Admin-managed menu items/categories/products.
known_issues: Admin Dashboard / backend management panel is missing from the project UI/builder interface.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore missing Admin Dashboard/CMS in builder UI and reconnect it to the dynamic Menu page so admin-managed items appear on the website (no UI redesign)
